definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: I conveyed Nixon's crucial decision to Dinitz.
sentences.chinese: 我向迪尼茨转达了尼克松关键性的决定。

sentences.english: Please convey my sympathy to your wife.
sentences.chinese: 请向你夫人转达我的慰问。

sentences.english: Please convey my gratitude to her.
They returned the kindness to Chairman Li and the National People's Congress of China.
sentences.chinese: 他们也向李委员长和中国全国人大转达了问候。

sentences.english: Ms. Hong ask me to say 'Hello' to you.
sentences.chinese: 洪女士让我转达她对你的问候。

sentences.english: Please convey my best wishes to him.
sentences.chinese: 请向他转达我最好的祝愿。

sentences.english: The robot’s stereophonic hearing conveyed the answers.
sentences.chinese: 机器人的立体声听觉转达答案。

sentences.english: Michael stayed by the phone relaying messages to Sonny.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔守着电话听到什么情况就向桑儿转达。

sentences.english: Tang first conveyed an oral message of President Hu Jintao.
sentences.chinese: 唐家璇首先转达了胡锦涛主席的口信。

sentences.english: Papoulias asked Hu to conveyed his best wishes for President Hu.
sentences.chinese: 帕普利亚斯请吴邦国转达对胡锦涛主席的良好祝愿。

sentences.english: Please leave word (for me) with my children not at home.
sentences.chinese: 如果我不在家，请留个信叫我孩子转达。

sentences.english: Has a food processor ever conveyed somebody’s undying love for you?
sentences.chinese: 事务处理机曾转达过某人对你永恒的爱吗？

sentences.english: Li Zhaoxing conveyed to her the cordial greetings from Chinese President Hu Jintao.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星向她转达了中国国家主席胡锦涛的亲切问候。

sentences.english: Wen first conveyed President Hu Jintao’s greetings to Emperor Akihito.
sentences.chinese: 温家宝首先转达了胡锦涛主席对天皇明仁的问候。

sentences.english: Please take my gratitude to other interviewers.
sentences.chinese: 请转达我对其他面试人员的谢意。

sentences.english: Jia QInglin conveyed the greetings of President Hu Jintao to President Fox.
sentences.chinese: 贾庆林转达了胡锦涛主席对福克斯总统的问候。

definition: to pass on a story/to communicate a message
to pass on to sb/to carry and give to sb else
to pass on/to convey/to relay/to transmit/transmission
to report/to give an account of/report
to report/to give an account of/to collect information and report back
to introduce (sb)/(esp.) to present to the emperor
to reply/to write back/letter written in reply/CL:封[feng1]
to entrust a task to sb else
